headlines.description: Fiorentina and Cagliari served up one of the dullest games since the Serie A season restarted just under one month ago when they played a draw.
headlines.shortLinkText: Fiorentina hold Cagliari to dull goalless draw

headlines.description: A second-half goal from Hirving Lozano gave Napoli a 2-1 win at struggling Genoa in Serie A on Wednesday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Lozano gives Napoli win amid VAR handball row

headlines.description: AS Roma ended a run of three successive Serie A defeats with a 2-1 win over Parma, who were angered after having a penalty turned down late.
headlines.shortLinkText: AS Roma end losing run against angry Parma

headlines.description: Atalanta continued their remarkable season by beating Sampdoria 2-0 on Wednesday to extend their winning run to nine Serie A games.
headlines.shortLinkText: Atalanta overcome stubborn Sampdoria to rack up ninth win in a row
